title: Which technology is going to replace SAP? - Quora

response.answer_text: SAP is not a technology, it’s a “technological product” to cater the ERP and business analytics needs. Any ERP technological product (like SAP, Oracle etc) will come to seize when companies will stop planning their enterprise resources, will stop thinking and planning for future, will stop looking for decision making tools and will stop running business. A better question would have been “Which company in ERP space can replace SAP” ?

ERP systems will not go out of vogue. It can only get bigger and better. New players may come but only the stronger ones survive. Developments in technologies covering all spheres of industry keep happening all the time. One needs to be keep himself/herself updated.
